website_summaries.verdict: Its wide handle might be off-putting at first, but it is quite comfortable after the initial learning curve. Especially good for those with large hands.
pros: We like the wide, sturdy handle, which promotes a comfortable grip among all hand sizes
cons: Takes a while to get used to the thicker handle

customer_reviews.title: Decent Kettlebell, just wish it had a better grip.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for home workouts and wanted something with a rubber coating on the base of the kettlebell to protect it from getting banged up outside and also to avoid damage to things inside when I put it down or store it. Price is reasonable. My only complaint is the grip. I sweat easily and the horns on this are painted, so it does get slippery as I work out. There is a little bit of texture, but not much. It's better than a brand my gym has with polished chrome handles, but not as good as powder coated kettlebells for grip. I will probably ad tape to improve the grip. Overall a pretty decent option.
customer_reviews.author: Pete W

customer_reviews.title: Handle Too Small
customer_reviews.text: My gripping fingers are 3 1/2 inches wide. This handle is only 3 1/4 inches wide making it impossible to use a flat grip Resulting in a condition that is both uncomfortable & creates a safety hazard. Dropped it once and painfully hit my side foot bone. The Gymenist kettle bell is 3 3/4 inches wide, costs less & is the one to buy. I'm giving it one star only because Amazon has a great return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Larry L. Emsweller

customer_reviews.title: Cracking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a few months ago and I noticed recently the vinyl has begun to crack.
customer_reviews.author: melisa

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kettlebell as a gift for my mom, heavy enough for an effective workout but light enough for her sensitive wrists. The delivery was a problem and the packaging came undone when it was delivered, leaving an open side of the box, to which my mom saw what was inside. The kettlebell also came with 2 scratches on the handle! I would return it but it was such a hassle for the delivery alone that im just going to avoid the whole situation all together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False advertising of product!!
customer_reviews.text: The false advertising of this product. States it is a set but instead I received a single kettlebell. I then contacted Amazon-customer service and was told I'd receive a refund in 3-5 days. That never happen either. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Beltran

customer_reviews.title: I will buy more of this brand!
customer_reviews.text: I love the coating on the weight. It keep the enamel from chipping, and I keep it in the basement so the coating protects the weight from moisture as well. The different color helps me distinguish the weight from the other kettlebells immediately. The handle is a touch small for 2 handed use though that's not that big a deal because it's still not that heavy. I have another SPRI kettlebell in a different weight and I will certainly add this brand to my collection over time. I use some baseball bat grip tape around the handle because my hands get sweaty and slippery and that works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: A Chinese product that isn’t bad. Sure the paint job is a bit clotted but this 30 pound weight is what it purports to be and worth it. Plus weights are hard to find. The weighting is the hardest part, not to sound Petty.
customer_reviews.author: Vike Savoth

customer_reviews.title: Horrible condition
customer_reviews.text: I paid $80 for a new kettlebell. What I got instead was a heavily USED kettlebell. Look at the video. I'd send it back but it's heavy, and super hard to find kettlebells right now, but look at the video. DO NOT BUY SPRI PRODUCTS.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Duran

customer_reviews.title: Nice they offer 8-pound size, but handle is too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 8-pound one. I was very disappointed to find the handle width is not sufficient for me. I am an average guy with average-sized hands, but I cannot comfortably get all four fingers around the handle without them being uncomfortably pinched. I am giving it three stars since it will be mostly used by my wife and it is hard to find 8-pounders from other manufacturers. For more standard sizes, I would definitely go with the Fitness Solutions Hammertone kettlebells. Those are solid iron and even the 5-pounder has a big enough handle for anybody's hands.
customer_reviews.author: Brewmaster96

customer_reviews.title: Description deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Description is deceiving, it states set, but is really only one weight
customer_reviews.author: Lashane Reid

customer_reviews.title: Handle too small
customer_reviews.text: I got the 5 and 8 lb kettlebells today and the handles are too small on both. I am a women and my hands are not large at all and I can't see using these for kettlebell swings w/ both hands. I am returning them. They might work well for someone who only plans on using these for one handed workouts.
customer_reviews.author: snowangeltae

customer_reviews.title: WATCH OUT! NOT A SET!
customer_reviews.text: Product headline needs to be changed to reflect that you will only receive 1 kettlebell for each size and NOT a set as stated. Yes, my bad for not researching the product reviews and questions. Fairly expensive piece of cast iron for 1 unit. I do like these kettlebells so I'll keep them. I'll need to order another 3 to match the 3 I have now though.
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Workout Toy!
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today!!! I have to say that it's my new favorite workout toy!!!! For those with Saskawa hands :please note: I have big hands I'm pretty sure I can flip catch this!! Thrilled with this purchase!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jeffdraft

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, gym-quality kettlebells
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, gym-quality kettlebells. I ordered a 15 and 20 lb and was so pleased with the quality I ordered a second of each size. I like how compact the kettlebells are without sacrificing the weight. The handle is a nice standard size (similar to the ones at my gym). Very easy to do kettlebell workouts in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was my second Kettlebell purchase and I am thrilled with the product! I had researched many different brands and read some pretty bad reviews so I was nervous about picking which one to go with. I have no complaints thus far with the SPRI Kettlebell. The quality was great and it was shipped well! Will purchase from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Tim and Sarah Davis

customer_reviews.title: Spri kettlebells
customer_reviews.text: I love Spri kettle bells! I have two 12 pounds, two 18 pounds and they have very good handles! I work out with the scorcher and body series from the kettlebell kickboxing program and these bells I found best suited to help provide easier girp/handling for my work outs. I use the 18 normally and the 12 pounds for standing balance challenges like the warrior requiring standing on one leg and if I just want to do bicep curls. I can do chest presses with the 12 pounds two and find them very effective.
customer_reviews.author: bl3ckc3t4790

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile!  Top notch construction
customer_reviews.text: This kettle ball is top notch. I've only used it very little because it is a bit light for me. I use the 10 lbs version a lot more. Nonetheless, this is a 5 star item. The grip is good and can be used with no gloves although it is a bit slick with bare hands. Would be nice to have a grippy coating of some type on the handle but that is a minor thing. Very versatile in the types of things you can do with it and will last for years under normal and correct use (don't throw it around). Definitely would suggest this to anyone looking to get a light weight kettle ball.
customer_reviews.author: Thorr

customer_reviews.title: I have been converted to kettlebells. I feel conflicted about this.
customer_reviews.text: I love my new kettlebell! My wrists are weak as hell so half of my exercises with dumbbells was focused on compensating the polarized weight and not dropping it on my head/face/foot. I like how the kettlebell fixed this issue--the weight is more dispersed. However, I will say that when using dumbbells, I definitely felt the workout with an 8 lb weight the next day (I'm weak, I know, don't judge me) but with the kettlebell, I feel nothing the next day nor am I tired after using it. Maybe that's part of the compensation issue I mentioned above but I will soon be upgrading to the 10 lb.
customer_reviews.author: MoHime8

customer_reviews.title: Dinged up but good enough.
customer_reviews.text: Mine came a little dinged up, but it works and since it's a weight it doesn't matter that much. I like the feel of the coating and the price was a little lower than other brands. There are some rough spots under the handle which is my biggest complaint. I liked it enough to order a second one though -- I have the 18 lb., and just ordered the 30 lb. . . . I am hoping that one comes in better condition, otherwise I will update/edit this review (one not seeming new okay, but not two).
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described and a great weight. I am just starting out with using ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and a great weight. I am just starting out with using weights, this is a perfect beginner for someone weak like me :) . I would say a 12 may have been a better choice, but am happy with the 10. Sturdy, easy to use as the handle is rounded perfectly. Will definitely buy more of same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Really nice kettlebell
customer_reviews.text: Smooth and easy to maneuver. Highly recommend. I’m a woman of average hand size and these are great.
customer_reviews.author: F. Koper

customer_reviews.title: Great price and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second size I've ordered from this company. Very happy with this product. Thick vinyl coating protects floors and is comfortable to hold. Sits nice and flat, little to no rocking for stability with floor exercises. Handle is nice to grip. It's smooth, but not slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Carpi

customer_reviews.title: Coating ix excellent
customer_reviews.text: Better than most I've seen. I like em... Would definitely get same line little bit more weight.
customer_reviews.author: Abel C

customer_reviews.title: Will work great if I do
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to use when the weather was too bad to get to the gym. Nice weight. I have two of these in different sizes. There are several different workouts you can find on the internet. These are very easy to use, and I prefer them over the standard dumbell weights. I also wanted to commend the seller on this item. I had ordered this and it never came. I contacted FedEx and the Post office and both showed it had been delivered. I contacted the seller and had another one in the mail that next day. It's nice to deal with people like that.
customer_reviews.author: slh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect "starter" kettle bell 8lbs
customer_reviews.text: This is my first kettle bell. Found this one to be of good quality and I like that the bottom part has the vinyl coating. Gives it a nice look and I also don't have to worry about it scratching our hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: I love this. First time you can give a package ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. First time you can give a package to someone and tell them it's a bowling ball. lol This was a my bday gift to myself, so I don't have to use the dirty ones at the gym. The mailman was concerned about me being able to carry it. lol
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: It's a good bell but the handle is very small
customer_reviews.text: It's a good bell but the handle is very small. I'm 5-10 175 pounds and the handle is small for me, but it works for my needs. However there are a lot of kettlebell exercises that would be difficult to do with this weight.
customer_reviews.author: K.W.

customer_reviews.title: These kettlebells suck
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with these kettlebells. I won't buy from them again
customer_reviews.author: Tommy C.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 35# Like that it has the vinyl on it. Not too large. Just right.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Great as a weight
customer_reviews.text: Great as a weight, but I wanted it for a door stop for terra cotta floor tiles. I tried to find a door stop & they were all so expensive & not as nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: LTK

customer_reviews.title: Good quality is worth the money
customer_reviews.text: High quality with good handles for grip. No issues with shipping such a heavy item.
customer_reviews.author: Isinkso

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the value!
customer_reviews.text: It's a kettlebell, what do you expect?! It seems high quality. I've used it once so far and it was great. However, I probably should have gotten the 15 lb. one, since jumping from zero to 18 pounds was a big jump! But that's not the fault of the product :) Good price for the value!
customer_reviews.author: Atomask

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is great!!! First time user of kettles. Works all my muscles better than my barbells. Small compact size.
customer_reviews.author: tina smith

customer_reviews.title: Very damaged. Not good
customer_reviews.text: I just received my kettle bell. It is very damaged. The handle is completely chipped and scuffed the bell part is scuffed up as well. The paint coating around the handle is very bumpy and scuffed. I don't usually leave bad reviews but this is ridiculous looks like it's been used for 20 years. Very dissappinted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kettlebell. Does not feel cheap. Good quality item for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Snapdragons1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect At Home Workout!
customer_reviews.text: Great kettlebell! Arrived on-time and does the job! Kettlebell workouts are perfect for my apartment because you only need a little space and it's a total body workout including cardio. I do Body Fit by Amy kettlebell workouts on YouTube on mornings that I can't get to the gym👍🌞✌👟💚
customer_reviews.author: Mrs_Fit_TJR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Weight for Me!!️
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for workouts! It came quickly. It is easy to hold and maneuver. I like that being as I have carpal tunnel. So that was a factor in the why I chose this and why I love this. Easy to grab and hold on to.
customer_reviews.author: qt-pie

customer_reviews.title: High quality kettlebell
customer_reviews.text: I have several SPRI kettlebells and love them all. The SPRI brand is an excellent product. I like the different colors based on weight. They had these as the gym which is why I decided to get them.
customer_reviews.author: Nyurt

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Fine for lifting and swinging, but not at all useful for dips or pushups because the bottom is not flat due to the cheap vinyl coating.
customer_reviews.author: A. W.

customer_reviews.title: I love my kettlebell!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this kettlebell. Good quality. Hope it lasts me years!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Russell

customer_reviews.title: Good coated kettlebell
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that there is no extra rubber plate on the bottom of these kettlebells. I also purchased the SPRI vertical rack that holds about 10 of these bells. Nice and compact for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: James B Battreall

customer_reviews.title: It looks like it was used for target practice before being shipped
customer_reviews.text: It looks like it was used for target practice before being shipped. There is a disgusting hole in the vinyl cover. It doesn't change the product function but it's pretty gross looking. Picture attached. Needless to say slightly disappointing upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: tonywtza

customer_reviews.title: I'll buy this again soon.
customer_reviews.text: I do believe this is the best kettle bell I have ever used. I have small hands, so the handle of the kettle bell is perfect for me. I also love the fact that it's so tiny. I don't need to worry about storage issues when I'm not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! 18 pounds is a good starter weight
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! 18 pounds is a good starter weight. I have been using it to just kind of stretch out and use some muscles now that I've been upgraded to a desk job.
customer_reviews.author: et al

customer_reviews.title: Excellent weights
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time - visually pleasing - no flaws thus far - heavy plastic coating, I don’t see them chipping the floors any time soon. I am very happy with these kettle weights
customer_reviews.author: Joey Gamboa

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my mini gym in my room lol
customer_reviews.author: Dianneoo7

customer_reviews.title: got it used, it's OK
customer_reviews.text: I got this on amazon warehouse deals. it's OK. there were some cuts in the vinyl, probably from there someone tried to cut the packaging. It's still good. I wanted a check 15lb kettlebell with a smooth handle and this is it. I got it for the same price that I paid for a brand new 10lb kettlebell. I also love the purple color.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love them all I have a collection for my workouts
customer_reviews.author: yaigc

customer_reviews.title: This would have been perfect. But the handle is not wide enough
customer_reviews.text: This would have been perfect. But the handle is not wide enough, especially for two-hand grip workouts such as kettlebell swings. I have fairly small hands and those with larger hands might want to use a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Terri J.

customer_reviews.title: wear a globes or you'll be sorry.
customer_reviews.text: looks good, but there's some sharp edges on the handle. who's doing the quality control on this products. you need to do your job.
customer_reviews.author: peter t callado

customer_reviews.title: Right size for smaller people.
customer_reviews.text: These kettlebells are smaller than the others I've seen. Great for smaller people. I'm 5 feet tall and the other bells I have seem to be too big.
customer_reviews.author: becky b

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and color. Love the rubber enclosure!
customer_reviews.text: After much research, I decided to go with the SPRI brand kettlebell and am glad I did. I like the rubber texture on the bottom so that it doesn't scratch or do so much floor damaged when set on the floor. I color is also bright and easy to remember which one to grab during HIIT Strength training. It's also well-made. I will be investing in more of this brand for the full set!
customer_reviews.author: KDQ

customer_reviews.title: Coating smells!
customer_reviews.text: Kettle bell itself works as described and looks great. I have no problem with both hands fitting on handle as some have stated and the blue rubberized coating is nice to protect floor it sits on. However 2 days after opening, the coating still smells awful, like a burnt rubber smell. I've put it outside to air out but it's not any better. Not happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: psuejp

customer_reviews.title: Great kettleball. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great kettleball for an individual with smaller hands like myself and gives just enough weight for a light but satisfying workout!
customer_reviews.author: Mardeisha

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Handle too small for two hands. Also, the handle because very slippery when you sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Limitedmom

customer_reviews.title: It's ok but probably good for someone with small hands or to use for ...
customer_reviews.text: The handle is not wide enough for two hands. My pinky fingers don't fit. It's ok but probably good for someone with small hands or to use for one arm swings.
customer_reviews.author: Spanishteacher

customer_reviews.title: They are great for home workouts
customer_reviews.text: They are great for home workouts. I like that they are coloured. the grip is a bit small for my hands sometimes and I have almost dropped it. OOPS! But really no complains except that they package them all in the same box and they can be a lot to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Keira

customer_reviews.title: Product is as described by the seller
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described by the seller. It is the perfect size & weight for me. I love the color also.
customer_reviews.author: Pkster

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The grip is comfortable and the weight is perfect. The different colors help me organize my weights.
customer_reviews.author: Savanah

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: These kettle bells are the perfect sizes. They are not too big and fit very nicely in the hand and are very manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Scappaticci

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the vinyl kettlebell it's easier on my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: WEIGHT WINNER!
customer_reviews.text: Great kettlebell that is perfect to hold onto for fitness class
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Roach

customer_reviews.title: Feels Great in you Hands
customer_reviews.text: Love that the "bell" part is encased in rubber/plastic and the handle is smooth yet easy to grip. We have others where the handle is a bit more rough and leaves your hands with a metal scent. This one is great!
customer_reviews.author: MacDavis

customer_reviews.title: Now swing it, weakling!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality shipped fast, the handle to bell ratio is a little off and it tends to fall over, whereas earthquakes don't move my old Everlast ones; this is a personal source of irkdom but your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these weights..very comfortable and don not take up much space RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Kind of disappointed in the color
customer_reviews.text: Kind of disappointed in the color. The advertised picture makes you think you are getting teal but it turns out to be just dark green. Wouldn't typically matter since it is for working out, but I ordered as a gift because I knew my friend would like the teal color so feel a little mislead.
customer_reviews.author: Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made, vinyl coating has held together so far
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice feel and and similar to what I use at my gym. Very well priced compared to other vendors.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: Decent value, equivalent quality to my prior Kettles. ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent value, equivalent quality to my prior Kettles. Only issue I had, was some dimwit in shipping decided to pack two 18lb kettles largely loose in a box with a $150 router/wifi-access box! 8^.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kadrie

customer_reviews.title: 18 LB (blue) - Good starter kettlebell!
customer_reviews.text: I looked up what was the best recommended starting weight for a kettlebell and found most people recommended 18 lb for women. I'm happy with my purchase. It is heavy but I'm sure as time goes on I will adjust. Anything lighter in weight and I would be wanting to upgrade. The handle is comfortable as well
customer_reviews.author: danibeezy

customer_reviews.title: So I sent it back and ordered straight-up cast iron kettlebells that will slide more easily against my skin
customer_reviews.text: The vinyl coating pinched my skin when I held the kettlebell over my wrist or on my shoulder (i.e. for overhead presses and offloaded squats). The vinyl coating stuck against my skin instead of sliding around slightly to adjust to the movement of my arm. So I sent it back and ordered straight-up cast iron kettlebells that will slide more easily against my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Megan B.

customer_reviews.title: A very nice kettle bell at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: A very nice kettle bell at a reasonable price. The vinyl coating is nice for using the weight anywhere you'd prefer not to be placing/dropping a 40# piece of black steel...
customer_reviews.author: S. Gau

customer_reviews.title: Great kettlebell for heavy lifters
customer_reviews.text: Great weight for those who have lifted kettlebells before. I am a beginner, so it's kind of heavy for me. Will be working with lighter kettlebells till I get to the heavier weights. Kettlebell is definitely a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn A. Stefaniak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Best money spent on this kettlebell! Super easy to hold and swing!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Will order again!!
customer_reviews.text: As expected! I read other reviews which stated the handle has sharp edges, I did not experience that at all. I had ordered 3 different sizes from this vendor, and all were just fine. Very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: It is a great middle weight for a specific work out I was ...
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered quickly. It is a great middle weight for a specific work out I was doing.
customer_reviews.author: Truthwarrior

customer_reviews.title: The kettelbell works great, but the packaging was junk
customer_reviews.text: The kettelbell works great, but the packaging was junk!! Im surprised the kettlebell was in one piece:-( It will still get the job done, but very disappointed in the packaging...
customer_reviews.author: Emily Warpness

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Does everything a kettlebell should do. Weighs 25 pounds when you pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: Dstar

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this kettlebell, and has asked for ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this kettlebell, and has asked for others. The quality speaks for itself on this one! It was not delivered as quickly as I had hoped, so dont wait until the last minute to order this item.
customer_reviews.author: Thank a Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Great kettlebell. A little smelly.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a solid kettlebell. I am not a huge fan of the smell and the width of the handle. If you have small hands and you luck out with a non-smelly version it would be the perfect kettlebell for the price.
customer_reviews.author: faruna

customer_reviews.title: Great Kettlebell!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a very timely fashion. The kettlebell itself appeared as if new, though it was a warehouse deal. I was very happy and extremely pleased with the condition it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but small.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. After a few workouts, I realized I needed a bigger handle for exercises that require a pass, or handoff. I will still use this for some exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased to find such a great price on this with ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased to find such a great price on this with free shipping! Item arrived in perfect condition and is an all around great kettlebell. Definitely prefer it to the plastic ones. Better balance and less prone to damage.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyjmt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My kettle bell came in perfect no problems and I use it m-f for my workouts, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Diaz

customer_reviews.title: What happened?
customer_reviews.text: Seems intact, but came in the mail in this condition.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price for the quality!
customer_reviews.text: I loved using this style kettlebell at my local gym and decided to get some for my mini home gym. Love the vinyl coating. Also, love that the different weights have different colors, making them easy to identify. Worth the price for the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, grip is nice and doesn't hurt my ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, grip is nice and doesn't hurt my hands and size is just good for a small person (I'm 5.3 and 120 lb)
customer_reviews.author: iPhone Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Use this all the time while doing my squats. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: BridgetLeah

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality kettlebell, no sharp edges or missing pcs / voids, and thick but not too thic handle. Just right for ,e. Shipping prompt as usual as well.
customer_reviews.author: DMURDMUR

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Both of my hands fit. My pinky can't grip tight but my hands fit well enough to hold the kettle bell. Great product for the price. Most stores don't carry the larger sizes so it was nice to get the 25 lb finally.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I like it and I use it
customer_reviews.text: It's fuchsia and a lovely fuchsia it is. What else is there to say? I like it and I use it......carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Conradean Sawicki

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my Kettlebells - this set is great, easy to use, no funky smell, pretty colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Darn nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. The handle is shaped well and the vinyl coating is nice, although after using it I don't know if there is really any benefit since I use it on a soft floor anyway.
customer_reviews.author: General28

customer_reviews.title: Freaking awesome weight!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little weight. Easy to clean! Feel like a beast when I lift this thing lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There are some rough spots on the underside of the ...
customer_reviews.text: There are some rough spots on the underside of the handle where it was not properly sanded. I had to file them down myself. Also some spots on the handle where the paint had chipped but that was just cosmetic. The rough handle was a problem.
customer_reviews.author: clipper

customer_reviews.title: Should it tear so easily? Otherwise a great kettlebell
customer_reviews.text: I have another one in a different size, works great, but this one started tearing one trip in the car the plastic covering had rips in it. Other than that it serves its purpose perfectly for working out.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rubel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, handle is too small.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this kettlebell is excellent, but the handle is rather small. I am accustomed to working out with a kettlebell, but I dropped this one several times due to the small handle.
customer_reviews.author: drestewart

customer_reviews.title: SPRI Deluxe Vinyl Kettlebell
customer_reviews.text: Perfect swing weight for me. The vinyl grip is comfortable and color is attractive. Hoping to buy a 26 pound soon.
customer_reviews.author: Meggie

customer_reviews.title: I love this kettle bell quality is very nice easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this kettle bell quality is very nice easy to grip. I will be ordering the rest soon in different lbs. Very pleased thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of work out equipment. Love the rubberized covering.
customer_reviews.author: KMM

product_meta.title: SPRI Kettlebell Weights Deluxe Cast Iron Vinyl Coated Comfort Grip Wide Handle Color Coded Kettlebell Weight Set
feature_bullets: KETTLEBELLS: Weights combine function and fun for an exciting and efficient workout - a true fitness classic for men or women of any age, in any weight room or gym
ULTIMATE WEIGHTLIFTING TOOL: Use kettlebells for squats, throws, cleans, jerks, snatches and rotational swings to develop muscular strength, power and endurance while also burning calories
WIDE GRIP HANDLES: Wide authentic kettlebell handles help to provide a secure and comfortable grip with no chalk needed
DURABLE VINYL COATED CASING: Weights are encased in a durable vinyl coating to help prevent floor damage and feature a flat bottom for easy storage an increased exercise opportunities
COLOR CODED: Kettlebells are color coded for easy weight identification - weight size is also listed in white writing for additional identification
